abstract: The rapid decline of measured unemployment has outpaced improvement in other economic indicators, leaving the Fed looking for a new yardstick.
snippet: The rapid decline of measured unemployment has outpaced improvement in other economic indicators, leaving the Fed looking for a new yardstick.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 10:25 p.m. | The Federal Reserve is struggling to redefine the central element of its economic stimulus campaign, its plans for short-term interest rates.

headline.main: Fed Searches for a New Method of Offering Guidance
headline.print_headline: Fed Searches for a New Method of Offering Guidance
